about.headline: Hi, I am Mohit. I am a software engineer based in Bangalore, IN.
about.para1: I work as a freelance full stack developer. I like building all sorts of things that have to do with the web. This includes websites ranging from simple static design to full stack social media web apps. I also like the design aspect of things and always try my best to provide amazing UX.

para2.3: and started work as an Intern at a local startup shortly after. I currently work as a freelance web developer but I am open for job opportunites.

hero.desc: I am a software engineer based in Bangalore, IN. I specialize in building fully fledged websites and applications.

workedWith.name: Skootr
workedWith.desc: Worked on designing the frontend dashboard for the company's enterprise app.

workedWith.name: Iarani Inc
workedWith.desc: Designed efficient / fast front-end in React / Redux with Firebase.

projects.name: Whiner - A social media App
projects.desc: Whiner is a full stack social media application which allows users to create posts, follow users, receive engagement notification and many other interactive things.

projects.name: Best Jobs - A recruiter facing Job Posting Board
projects.desc: Recruiter dashboard for a job portal website in react. Allows recruiter authentication and job postings.

projects.name: Keepnotes - For organizing and editing notes
projects.desc: Web App in react to create, organize and edit notes. Uses react calendar and redux. Notes are persisted to localstorage.

projects.name: Retro Public Chatroom
projects.desc: A simple relatime public chatroom. Users can join different rooms and change their names on joining. This is an SPA made with only Vanilla JS w/o any frameworks.

projects.name: Github Profile Stats
projects.desc: A web app for retrieving relevant github stats such as stars, followers, repositories etc. and displaying them in an organized manner.

projectsMini.name: CSS Netflix Clone
projectsMini.desc: A Netflix landing page clone in CSS and HTML.

projectsMini.name: Twitter @ mentions
projectsMini.desc: A javascript app to check @ mentions with run time parsing.

projectsMini.name: Puzzle Solver
projectsMini.desc: A problem solver I made for a discord challenge.

projectsMini.name: WeatherOrNot
projectsMini.desc: Simple weather App to demonstrate the use of AccuWeather API

projectsMini.name: C++ Games with DirectX
projectsMini.desc: C++ was my first programming language and in my spare time I like to learn/make simple games with minimal physics. This repo is an archive for the same

projectsMini.name: Secure Authentication with XOR encryption
projectsMini.desc: A C++ console application for creating user accounts and storing the password and other relevant data by encrypting with XOR
